ibelgaufts.sungka

Class MCTSNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibelgaufts.sungka.MCTSNode

  • public class MCTSNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Node for Monte Carlo Search Tree
    Based on example code by Simon Lucas from mcts.ai/code/java.html
    The original example simulated coin flips. This version should be able to handle anything that implements the Game interface
